<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SegmentWriter.getLength() == 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal">      (RecordKind == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a856d291d3b47f25806d62863137976a2aa1017051aa12b8176e548f2752a73693">ContinuationRecordKind::FieldList</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">          ? &amp;<a href="#a5bd699f2ab309af4b02699179c5aac56">InjectFieldList</a></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">  InjectedSegmentBytes =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a238eda31f74c0f0f3224f71b50b7d165">CVType</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a>(&amp;Prefix, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Prefix));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RecordType&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/continuationrecordbuilder/#ae34aaae4476c9e3f0c4bbd5626bdd856"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/continuationrecordbuilder/#ae34aaae4476c9e3f0c4bbd5626bdd856">ContinuationRecordBuilder::writeMemberType</a>(RecordType &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Kind);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t OriginalOffset = SegmentWriter.getOffset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/cvmemberrecord">CVMemberRecord</a> CVMR;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  CVMR.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/cvmemberrecord/#a9ed7c83e13705c1e202683c4374c45ad">Kind</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a945d5dcbe78d400d17656726e2f6089b">TypeLeafKind</a></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a>.getKind());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Member Records aren&#39;t length-prefixed, they only have a 2-byte TypeLeafKind</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// at the beginning.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1e1474f15df639f0d874b21f15666f7">cantFail</a>(SegmentWriter.writeEnum(CVMR.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/cvmemberrecord/#a9ed7c83e13705c1e202683c4374c45ad">Kind</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1e1474f15df639f0d874b21f15666f7">cantFail</a>(Mapping.visitMemberBegin(CVMR));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1e1474f15df639f0d874b21f15666f7">cantFail</a>(Mapping.visitMemberEnd(CVMR));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure it&#39;s padded to 4 bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#ae9446f182f86fd8c4dca65264de68235">addPadding</a>(SegmentWriter);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(getCurrentSegmentLength() % 4 == 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The maximum length of a single segment is 64KB minus the size to insert a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// continuation.  So if we are over that, inject a continuation between the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// previous member and the member that was just written, then end the previous</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// segment after the continuation and begin a new one with the just-written</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// member.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (getCurrentSegmentLength() &gt; <a href="#a469414953a3eb21f68469e412b50659f">MaxSegmentLength</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to inject some bytes before the member we just wrote but after</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the previous member.  Save off the length of the member we just wrote so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that we can do validate it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t MemberLength = SegmentWriter.getOffset() - OriginalOffset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">    (void) MemberLength;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">    insertSegmentEnd(OriginalOffset);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since this member now becomes a new top-level record, it should have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// gotten a RecordPrefix injected, and that RecordPrefix + the member we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// just wrote should now constitute the entirety of the current &quot;new&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// segment.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(getCurrentSegmentLength() == MemberLength + </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/recordprefix">RecordPrefix</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(getCurrentSegmentLength() % 4 == 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(getCurrentSegmentLength() &lt;= <a href="#a469414953a3eb21f68469e412b50659f">MaxSegmentLength</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">uint32&#95;t ContinuationRecordBuilder::getCurrentSegmentLength()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SegmentWriter.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#a2d1fbfecba0a643a1db961c9f9313b6e">getOffset</a>() - SegmentOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#acd9e771a3296c6b24146955754620557">back</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">  (void)SegmentBegin;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> - SegmentBegin &lt;= <a href="#a469414953a3eb21f68469e412b50659f">MaxSegmentLength</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to make space for the continuation record.  For now we can&#39;t fill</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// space to at least be there.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">  Buffer.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/appendingbinarybytestream/#ad444e7dc0b30ff2af7e7e3362287f291">insert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, InjectedSegmentBytes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t NewSegmentBegin = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + <a href="#a1ca9f1e09940d659d6ac2be3761955ff">ContinuationLength</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t SegmentLength = NewSegmentBegin - SegmentOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#acd9e771a3296c6b24146955754620557">back</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  (void) SegmentLength;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a238eda31f74c0f0f3224f71b50b7d165">CVType</a> ContinuationRecordBuilder::createSegmentRecord(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint32&#95;t OffBegin, uint32&#95;t OffEnd, std::optional&lt;TypeIndex&gt; RefersTo) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(OffEnd - OffBegin &lt;= USHRT&#95;MAX);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a> = Buffer.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/appendingbinarybytestream/#ab80f357bc9e2e1f997bfc489cbb63819">data</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Write the length to the RecordPrefix, making sure it does not include</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sizeof(RecordPrefix.Length)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/recordprefix">RecordPrefix</a> &#42;Prefix = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/recordprefix">RecordPrefix</a> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.data());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">  Prefix-&gt;RecordLen = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.size() - </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/recordprefix/#afdb0f5c60aa51c3ac0d3cad028e17e8e">RecordPrefix::RecordLen</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RefersTo) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Continuation = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.take&#95;back(<a href="#a1ca9f1e09940d659d6ac2be3761955ff">ContinuationLength</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    ContinuationRecord &#42;CR =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">ContinuationRecord &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Continuation.data());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CR-&gt;Kind == TypeLeafKind::LF&#95;INDEX);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CR-&gt;IndexRef == 0xB0C0B0C0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">    CR-&gt;IndexRef = RefersTo-&gt;getIndex();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a238eda31f74c0f0f3224f71b50b7d165">CVType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/continuationrecordbuilder/#a315b005fd28fb91606126f127019a376"><Highlight kind="normal">std::vector&lt;CVType&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/continuationrecordbuilder/#a315b005fd28fb91606126f127019a376">ContinuationRecordBuilder::end</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/typeindex">TypeIndex</a> Index) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/recordprefix">RecordPrefix</a> Prefix(<a href="#a217901fe9457c329df145c2532371d72">getTypeLeafKind</a>(&#42;Kind));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a238eda31f74c0f0f3224f71b50b7d165">CVType</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a>(&amp;Prefix, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Prefix));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa1e1474f15df639f0d874b21f15666f7">cantFail</a>(Mapping.visitTypeEnd(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We&#39;re now done, and we have a series of segments each beginning at an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// offset specified in the SegmentOffsets array.  We now need to iterate</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// over each segment and post-process them in the following two ways:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1) Each top-level record has a RecordPrefix whose type is either</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    LF&#95;FIELDLIST or LF&#95;METHODLIST, but the Length field is still 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    Those should all be set to the correct length now.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2) Each continuation record has an IndexRef field which we set to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    magic value 0xB0C0B0C0.  Now that the caller has told us the TypeIndex</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    they want this sequence to start from, we can go through and update</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    each one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Logically, the sequence of records we&#39;ve built up looks like this:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;0&#93;:   &lt;Length&gt;                    (Initially: uninitialized)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;0&#93;+2: LF&#95;FIELDLIST</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;0&#93;+4: Member&#91;0&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;0&#93;+?: ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;0&#93;+?: Member&#91;4&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;-8: LF&#95;INDEX</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;-6: 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;-4: &lt;Type Index of Next Record&gt; (Initially: 0xB0C0B0C0)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;:   &lt;Length&gt;                    (Initially: uninitialized)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;+2: LF&#95;FIELDLIST</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;+4: Member&#91;0&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;+?: ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;1&#93;+?: Member&#91;s&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;2&#93;-8: LF&#95;INDEX</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;2&#93;-6: 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;2&#93;-4: &lt;Type Index of Next Record&gt; (Initially: 0xB0C0B0C0)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;N&#93;:   &lt;Length&gt;                    (Initially: uninitialized)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;N&#93;+2: LF&#95;FIELDLIST</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;N&#93;+4: Member&#91;0&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;N&#93;+?: ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SegmentOffsets&#91;N&#93;+?: Member&#91;t&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// And this is the way we have laid them out in the serialization buffer.  But</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we cannot actually commit them to the underlying stream this way, due to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the topological sorting requirement of a type stream (specifically,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TypeIndex references can only point backwards, not forwards).  So the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sequence that we return to the caller contains the records in reverse</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order, which is the proper order for committing the serialized records.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;CVType&gt; Types;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">  Types.reserve(SegmentOffsets.size());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a> SO = SegmentOffsets;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t End = SegmentWriter.getOffset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::optional&lt;TypeIndex&gt; RefersTo;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(SO)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">    Types.push&#95;back(createSegmentRecord(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, End, RefersTo));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">    End = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">    RefersTo = Index++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
